ash3.name: Ash
ash3.title: Borrowed Power
ash3.description: Ash, having been granted some power from Melíai, who is a version of herself from another world, and whom she fights earnestly to save.

Castle Hall: I have been bestowed a new power, and it would be my utmost pleasure to give my very best for everyone.
I am most grateful to you for providing me with such peace of mind.
Please do not hesitate to let me know if there is anything that I can assist you with.
Why, what a lovely day it is. I would very much like to spend this valuable time together with you.
Melíai and I are not similar in the slightest. Though I do believe there is something we share in common.
Visit: My sincerest apologies for disturbing you. I have come to deliver greetings from [F].
Level: If I were to say so myself, I would consider this a satisfactory result.
I do believe the most important matter is that of moderation.
I feel utterly ashamed to show my face.
Summon: I am Ash, retainer to Lord Askr. With this new strength, I wish to be of tremendous service to everyone.
Learn Skill: I am exorbitantly grateful to receive such a gift.
Confession:
Though odd as it may sound, I do feel blessed to have come across a me from another world...
We may be the same being, but I am amazed by how different we are due to our vastly different upbringings.
I was created by Lord Askr to serve all humans. I have not forgotten my duty.
While on this path, I met all these people, overcame hardships, and got to know true joy and sadness.
My heart aches with pity, considering how lonesome Melíai must have been. Which is precisely why...
I would like to offer my assistance so that she, too, may feel the joy of life and be able to share that with others.
Status: Um... I may have received more power than I am worthy of. As such, I shall endeavor to give my best for all of you.
*startle* You must understand how befuddling it is to be caught unawares like that.
While I recognize that Melíai may be me from another world, I am utterly baffled by how different we are.
I am positively bursting with joy at being able to work on behalf of everyone.
I do feel a profound pity for Melíai, having to live without knowing Lord Askr's love.
Lord Askr...Father...please watch over us.
I would be most pleased if you would allow me to stay by your side for a long time to come.

hinoka6.name: Hinoka
hinoka6.title: Warrior of Gusto
hinoka6.description: A princess of Hoshido who is sincere in all she does. She trains day in and day out, standing up against any who threaten her family. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

Castle Hall: I'd like to spend some quiet time with my pegasus, with no thoughts of battle. I should value times like these.
I was just taking a breather. I don't mind if you want to join me, [S].
They say to always conduct yourself as if on the battlefield. Call out to me if you see anything suspicious.
Rice is a great source of energy. I like to eat up before going into battle.
I aim to be as strong and capable as my siblings. They are truly splendid.
Visit: Allow me to offer you greetings from [F].
Level: You'll have to best me if you want to get past! That is, if you can!
Come at me all you want and you'll see the full might of a Hoshidan warrior.
I won't let anyone past me, no matter who comes my way.
Summon: I am Princess Hinoka of Hoshido. The pride of the Hoshidan royal family resides in my heart. I'm ready to go!
Learn Skill: What do you think? I look strong, don't I?
Confession:
Is it already time to depart for the next battle? It's not a problem for me, I just...
I feel a little light-headed from the bath I took earlier... I was just trying to cool off...
Oh? I give off a different impression in the castle than in battle? I grew up as a Hoshidan princess, you know.
I'm in the midst of learning proper word usage, and how to conduct myself appropriately. But...
It's common for me to enter battle, so I place more value in warrior aptitude than princess etiquette.
And I would feel weird being treated like a princess now... So I'd like you to deploy me to the front lines.
Don't hesitate. Got that, [S]?!
Status: A new weapon, huh? I'll do my best to live up to it.
*react* Hey, watch it! It's not nice to mess with people!
I swear I'll use this power to bring peace to Hoshido—no, to the world.
I won't neglect my training, no matter what world I'm in. And I'll have no trouble finding a sparring partner here!
Quit sayin' such sappy things! It's embarrassing.
Oh Corrin... I wish I knew what your future holds.
It brings me great joy to battle alongside you for your cause.

ryoma5.name: Ryoma
ryoma5.title: Warrior of Bonds
ryoma5.description: The first prince of Hoshido, who bears the responsibility of his country. He polishes his technique with his family's unity ever at the forefront of his mind. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

Castle Hall: As the eldest son of the Hoshidan royal family, I strive to bring everyone together for solidarity.
Hinoka fights with valor now, but she was quite a crybaby when she was little. She embraces her emotions.
Takumi lacks a little self-awareness, but I believe he will become stronger given time.
Azura guards her heart. Even when we spent time together as siblings, I sensed a distance between us.
Sakura, the youngest, is kind-hearted. She is always prioritizing others. It is an admirable, yet worrisome, trait.
Visit:
It is [S], right?
I hope you will continue to be friends with [F].
Level: We siblings hold strong bonds. We are the souls of Hoshido, linked by Corrin. There is no foe we fear!
Strength isn't solely skill or power. It requires strength of heart to strike down foes without faltering.
Ahh! No, I must not hesitate if I aim to grow stronger...
Summon:
My bonds with my siblings make me stronger. No matter the foe, I will not back down!
I, Ryoma, high prince of Hoshido, will forge ahead!
Learn Skill: You have my gratitude, Summoner. I hope we can form a relationship built on mutual respect.
Confession:
Summoner. That inquisitive gaze... Did you wish to ask me something about this ring?
Long ago, my siblings and I had it crafted and we made a vow.
That vow was to present the ring to Corrin upon our safe reunion. It is something of a luck charm.
I believe we siblings—Hoshidan and Nohrian—can bring joy to the world if we join together around Corrin.
I am considering a similar ring for the day when I can finally welcome you to Hoshido, [S].
That is how much I value our bond. We, too, are siblings.
Status: Apparently, this outfit represents my bond with my siblings.
Hm? Use caution. You will find this armor has sharp edges.
My siblings have grown to possess such strength and kindness. I am extremely proud of them.
We are greater than Nohr in many ways. Even when it comes to familial bonds.
I must devote myself to perfecting my swordsmanship so that I can protect everyone.
Corrin...such an enigmatic child...with a fate shrouded in mystery.
Strange. I sense a bond between us that is not unlike those I have with my siblings.

scarlet.name: Scarlet
scarlet.title: Rebellious Streak
scarlet.description: A knight from Cheve who leads a group of resistance fighters against the army of Nohr. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

Castle Hall: This castle is top-notch. I could stay here forever.
If we let ourselves be pinned down, we'll be treated this way forever. We must strike the throat of our enemy!
Seems like you're always on the go, [S]!
This world's accessories are looking pretty sharp! Heh. They match my style.
If I smash these rocks apart, I can get at the good stuff. The sparkling bits sure pretty up my weapon!
Visit: Hah! This castle is pretty neat. I've come with greetings for you from [F]!
Level: Bring it, world! Show me what you've got!
Hey, this is nothing to fret over. Better luck next time!
Summon: I'm Scarlet. Cheve will not yield to Nohr—I'll make sure of it. I will achieve freedom for my people!
Learn Skill: For me? Gotta say, nice choice!
Confession:
It's almost that time again to pretty up my little friend... Now, hold still... It won't hurt... Ah!
Oh it's you, [S]!
As you can see, I'm smashing some rocks apart. You see, the sparkly bits are all mixed in with the rest.
First, I set my friend—my weapon— down. Then I slather on some of this magical liquid.
Once it's all coated, I stick on the shiny fragments. Decorating like this is probably my favorite hobby...
Hey, you should try it some time. Come on. It'll be a nice change of pace!
Special: You went and got me mad.
I'll get all Nohrian on you!
Status: I'm Scarlet, by the way. I'm a self-taught fighter, but I'm confident in my abilities.
Whoa! Heh. Not bad.
I won't let Nohr oppress my people any longer. For freedom!
When I found out Ryoma was a Hoshidan prince... Well, it was surprising, to say the least.
The enemy of my enemy is my friend. Heh, don't sweat it. I'm on your side.
It's tradition among the knights of Cheve to pin on a flower whenever one faces a monumental event.
You're pretty special, getting everyone to follow you around like this. But...you're not quite as special as Ryoma.

shura.name: Shura
shura.title: Righteous Rebel
shura.description: Survivor of the ruined nation of Kohga. Now a thief in Nohr, he dreams of rebuilding his homeland. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

Castle Hall:
You call us Heroes, but there are all types here. Royalty, nobles, knights, even a few outlaws, like me.
Even a few people who have lost their homelands...
I was born a ninja in Hoshido, but I lived as an outlaw in Nohr. I'm one of Kohga's surviving few.
Be careful when you go out on patrols. Your life actually has value, so don't go dying a careless death.
I like listening to people talk about their homelands. If you've got the time, tell me about yours.

You Hero types sure are a noble bunch. Risking your lives to save a kingdom that's not even your own...
Makes me regret becoming an outlaw, rather than some upstanding soldier with a righteous cause.
Visit:
Are you [S]?
I'm here to deliver a greeting from [F].
Level: One step closer to rebuilding Kohga...
I hope your expectations of me aren't too high.
Summon: I'm Shura, from Nohr. This place has a noble air about it... I don't think an outlaw like me will fit in.
Learn Skill: I'll try to meet your expectations of me, no matter how sparse.
Confession:
You on patrol? You spend a lot of time checking up on everyone, but you should get out sometime.
I headed out just the other day. Took a look around Askr, went people watching... I saw some kids playing.
They reminded me of my homeland, Kohga... Before it was destroyed.
When you summoned me out of the blue and started calling me a Hero, I was sure you were dead wrong.
I wanted nothing more than to get back to my own world as soon as I could. But, well...
After seeing how much this world has that's worth protecting, and after you dedicated so much time to me...
I remembered what happiness feels like. Well, I at least remembered that there was a time when I was happy.
Besides, every time I become stronger, I get one step closer to rebuilding Kohga.
I guess what I'm trying to say is... Thanks. And keep up the good work.
Status: Don't waste your time talking to me. There are better people to chat with.
Me? A Hero? Don't say things like that. I'm not a good person.
If someone destroyed your homeland, wouldn't you seek revenge?
You don't have to pat me down like that. I haven't been stealing your things.
Being stuck here surrounded by all these Heroes... Someone may mistake me for an upstanding citizen.
I'm not ready to die yet...not 'till Kohga's rebuilt, anyway.
"Justice?" "Heroes?" Just words. Or so I thought until I met you.

haitaka.name: Haitaka
haitaka.title: Persistent General
haitaka.description: A spearman from Hoshido who built an impenetrable defense while protecting Fort Dragonfall. Appears in Fire Emblem Fates.

Castle Hall: The wars in this world are waged by people not unlike those in my own, so my tactics should still be effective.
Fort Dragonfall is a natural stronghold made from the decayed remains of an ancient dark dragon.
I've examined this castle's defense system. I have several suggestions for enhancing its functionality.
In battle, balance is crucial. You will not suffer defeat if you can control the balance during confrontations.
Hoshido and Nohr—equal nations in constant conflict. That is the history of the world I know.
Visit: You should endeavor to work hard alongside [F].
Level: My strongest skills are in formulating defensive strategies. The opposite... not so much...
You must hold your ground without breaking formation. That is essential.
Summon: I am Haitaka, a Hoshidan general. Let me show you some of my Hoshidan combat techniques.
Learn Skill: I am grateful for the kindness you show outsiders.
Confession:
Summoner from another world, I am thankful for this unique opportunity.
Soldiers of Hoshido polish their techniques for their lords and nation, to defend against the Nohrian army.
I never considered a way of life other than that. My world was simple.
But...I've observed the Heroes in this land and learned of their multifarious reasons for going into battle.
My spear is for Hoshido, but for now, I will contemplate the meaning of war as I use it for your sake.
Status: I am Haitaka. Care for a little lesson in Hoshidan combat?
Hey! What are you up to? Do you have a death wish?
As if I would allow our beautiful Hoshido to be overrun by Nohrian barbarians.
King Sumeragi and Queen Mikoto were both extraordinary people.
Battle is cruel. There is often a chance of being captured by the enemy.
I can hardly believe I am stuck fighting for an army from another world...
It seems we are connected by fate. I shall hasten your foes to their graves with my spear.
